snippet: To the Editor:    Your Oct. 30 news article on Proposition 215, the California ballot initiative that would make the medical use of marijuana legal, misses the point....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your Oct. 30 news article on Proposition 215, the California ballot initiative that would make the medical use of marijuana legal, misses the point.
abstract: Dr Mitchell S Rosenthal letter on Oct 30 article on California ballot initiative to legalize medical use of marijuana (S)

headline.main: Science Votes No on California's Marijuana Plan
